content.content: Looks like this question requires knowledge of specific algorithms and none of the existing solutions have clear explanations for a simpler way to solve.
Looking at medium, couldn\'t have guessed it\'s a flow problem.
This is not a good interview questions cuz it requires unique knowledge of bipartite graph. Its impossible to solve if you dont know that the algo and there is no alternative solution
I think related topics is not matched with the hint and also Backtracking gives me TLE
